channel.title: My Beautiful Blog
channel.description: Recent content on My Beautiful Blog

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi! My name is Tristan Pestoni Garcia. This is a blog I have made as an assignment for one of my university courses, using GitHub and Hugo. Before continuing, I’ll give you some time to appreciate how beautiful my website looks (let’s ignore that 99% of the work has been done for me).

I guess I should talk about myself a bit. Some of the things I like the most are listening to music (which I do constantly), playing videogames, reading and writing. I also like technology in general, that’s why I have done this blog in the first place…
